name: rms-api-tests
description: API endpoint tests for Restaurant Management System

scripts.test:local: node -e "const tests = require('./tests/apiEndpointTests.js'); tests.CONFIG.USE_LOCAL = true; tests.runAllTests().then(r => process.exit(r.failed > 0 ? 1 : 0));"
scripts.test:production: node -e "const tests = require('./tests/apiEndpointTests.js'); tests.CONFIG.USE_LOCAL = false; tests.runAllTests().then(r => process.exit(r.failed > 0 ? 1 : 0));"

author: RMS Development Team
